definitions.definition: seek information or advice from (someone with expertise in a particular area).
examples: you should consult a financial advisor
synonyms: have recourse to; informalpick someone's brains "you need to consult a lawyer"

definitions.definition: have discussions or confer with (someone), typically before undertaking a course of action.
examples: patients are entitled to be consulted about their treatment
synonyms: deliberate; informalput their heads together "the government must consult with interested parties"

definitions.definition: refer for information to (a book, watch, etc.) in order to ascertain something.
examples: consult the index at the back of the brochure

definitions.definition: an act of consulting a professional; a consultation.
examples: after a consult with his attorneys, he retracted his previous statement
